title.description: The title of the block see in Site Editor

optionsTitle.description: Text to entitle the login options.

emailAndPasswordTitle.description: Text to display the email-and-password option.

accessCodeTitle.description: Text to display the access-code option.

emailPlaceholder.description: Text to be displayed as placeholder to the email input.

passwordPlaceholder.description: Text to be displayed as placeholder to the password input.

acessCodePlaceholder.description: Text to be displayed as placeholder to the access code input.

showPasswordVerificationIntoTooltip.description: Whether a tooltip responsible for checking the password format should be shown (true) or not (false).

showIconProfile.description: Whether the hpa-profile icon from Store Icons should be displayed on the Login component (true) or not (false).

iconLabel.description: Text string to entitle the Login icon.

hideIconLabel.description: Whether the text string defined for the Login icon should be hidden (true) or not (false).

providerPasswordButtonLabel.description: Text to be displayed as the password button label.

identifierPlaceholder.description: Text to be displayed as placeholder to the extension input.

invalidIdentifierError.description: Error message for invalid user identifier.

mirrorTooltipToRight.description: Whether the Login tooltip should open towards the right side of the screen (true) or not (false).

logInButtonBehavior.description: Expected behavior of the Login component when clicked on. Possible values are: popover (opens a popover tab) and link (redirects user to the /login page).

label.description: Text lable for the custom link.

accountOptionsButtonBehavior.description: Creates a custom link to replace the default one set for the accountOptionsButtonBehavior's link value (/account). Check out below the available props for the object.
